subject: Golf
lead_paragraph: Arun Atwal captured the Wyndham Championship in Greensboro, N.C., becoming India’s first PGA Tour winner and the first Monday qualifier to win on the tour in 24 years.
snippet: Arun Atwal captured the Wyndham Championship in Greensboro, N.C., becoming India’s first PGA Tour winner and the first Monday qualifier to win on the tour in 24 years.
